yacl3.config.autodrop.title: AutoDrop
yacl3.config.autodrop.category.general.r: Toggles the functionality of the mod.
Opens the screen to configure your archives.
Defines the delay that is applied after the trigger for a drop.
yacl3.config.autodrop.category.general.g: Define when the autodrop function is invoked.
Toggles whether the autodrop function should run when picking up an item.
Toggles whether the autodrop function should run when sneaking.
